icon-picker-dialog.base64-hint: Tignitin n usettenggel n Base64 i d-yettaken abrid fessusen akken ad ternuḍ kra n tignit ɣer wumuɣen-ik·im. Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ameẓlu am [www.base64-image.de]({{link}} iwakken ad tselkteḍ tugna i tebɣiḍ ɣer uzrar yettwasetgel s base64. Annect-a yettedu ula i tugniwin gift imrayen!
icon-picker-dialog.reload-button-tooltip: Ales asali n isental n tignitin meṛṛa
icon-picker-dialog.hint: Lmed [dagi]({{link}}) amek ara ternuḍ neɣ ad d-tesnulfuḍ isental-ik·im n tignit.

achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad talseḍ awennez n usfari?
achievements-dialog.reset-confirmation-message: Akk iseḍruyen d ufara n yiswiren ad ruḥen. Tigawt-agi ulamek ara ad tettwasemmet.
achievements-dialog.title: Iseḍruyen
achievements-dialog.no-completed-achievements: Mazal ur tfukkeḍ ara akk yakan iseḍruyen.
achievements-dialog.reset-button-tooltip: Ales awennez n meṛṛa n iseḍruyen d usfari n iswiren

settings.restore-general-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen imuta?
settings.restore-general-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n aḥraz n yiɣewwaren imuta!
settings.restore-general-settings-success-message: Iɣewwaṛen-ik·im imuta ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-title: D tidet tebɣiḍ ad d-terreḍ iɣewwaṛen n wumuɣ?
settings.restore-menu-settings-warning-message: Ayagi ad isemselsi umuɣen-ik·im amiran akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣen s igburen n ufaylu n weḥraz yettwafernen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-error-title: Yecceḍ usali n weḥraz n wumuɣen!
settings.restore-menu-settings-success-message: Umuɣen-ik·im akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣ ttwarran-d seg ufaylu n weḥraz.

general-settings-dialog.check-for-new-versions-info: Ma yermed, Kando ad d-yesken tilɣa mi ara yili lqem amaynut.
general-settings-dialog.invisible-settings-button-info: Mazal tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ taqeffalt, ad d-tban mi ara tesmuttiḍ taɣerdayt sufella-as.
general-settings-dialog.settings-button-position-info: Fren tiɣmert n ugdil anda ara d-yettwasken tqeffalt n yiɣewwaṛen.
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-color-scheme-info: Ma tferneḍ ' Anagraw', asfaylu n yiɣewwaṛen ad sqedcen azenziɣ n yini am win n unagraw-ik·im n wammud.
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-color-scheme: Iɣewwaṛen n uzenziɣ n yini n usfaylu
general-settings-dialog.settings-window-flavor-info: Ma tferneḍ lbenna tafrawant, issefk ad talseḍ asenker n usfaylu n iɣewwaṛen akken ad tesneseḍ asemdu.
general-settings-dialog.tray-icon-flavor-info: Tzemreḍ daɣen ad tferneḍ ad teffreḍ tignit n ufeggag n waddad.
general-settings-dialog.tray-icon-flavor: Lbenna n tignit ufeggag n waddad
general-settings-dialog.reload-menu-theme: Ales asali n usentel n wumuɣ
general-settings-dialog.reload-sound-theme: Ales asali n usentel n imesli
general-settings-dialog.dev-tools-note: Kando iseqdac sin n yisfuyla: Yiwen i wumuɣ, yiwen i yiɣewwaṛen. Tzemreḍ ad teldiḍ ifecka n tneflit akken ad tsewḍeḍ yal yiwen seg sin n yisfuyla-agi.

introduction-dialog.slide3-hint1: Tzemreḍ daɣen ad tsiteḍ dagi akken ad tmedleḍ umuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide3-hint2: Sit anida tebɣiḍ dagi akken ad tferneḍ aferdis.
introduction-dialog.slide3-text: Deg Kando, ** agdil-ik·im akk d asiti anican**! Ur tesriḍ ara ad tḥakṛeḍ tignitin, tzemreḍ ad tsiteḍ anda tebɣiḍ deg uḥric n ukerdis. Aya yettarra iferdisen d imellilen ugar.
introduction-dialog.slide4-text: Umuɣ anaddaw **dima yezga** yeldi ɣer usewwaṛ n tɣerdayt-ik·im. **Ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad teṛjuḍ merru akken ad tfaked* *. Eg laman deg tkatut-ik·im sakin kcem ɣer ufran-ik·im!
introduction-dialog.slide5-hint: Sit anida tebɣiḍ dagi akken ad taliḍ deg uswir.
introduction-dialog.slide5-text: Akken ad **tuɣaleḍ ɣer deffir**, tekki ɣef tneccabt tamarawt, neɣ di tlemmast n wumuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide6-text: Akka, tzemreḍ ad tesnirmeḍ taɣessa n wumuɣ s tɣawla.
introduction-dialog.slide7-title: Uɣal d arurad: Askar n tecreḍt
introduction-dialog.slide7-text: Sit sakin zuɣer ɣef uferdis akken ad tkecmeḍ ɣer uskar n tecreḍt. **Ma tḥebseḍ amussu usewwaṛ neɣ tgeḍ tuzzya, umuɣ annadaw yettwazuɣren ad yeldi!** Cfu ɣef ubrid ɣer uferdis syin tessunɣeḍ-tt s yimussuten infalan s wudem azigzag.
introduction-dialog.slide8-text: **Umuɣ yettarra-d i tigawin-ik·im n tɣerdayt!** Umuɣ anaddaw yeldi ma tebɣiḍ ad yeldi. S kra usleɣmu, ad tizmireḍ ad tferneḍ iferdisen war ma tmuqleḍ ula ɣer wumuɣ.
introduction-dialog.slide9-text: Ma **teǧǧiḍ annal ɣef tqeffalt** (am Ctrl_, _Shift_, neɣ _Alt_) seld mi teldiḍ umuɣ, tzemreḍ ad tgeḍ tafrayt s usmutti n usewweṛ. Ulac asiti neɣ azuɣer yettwasra.
introduction-dialog.slide10-text: **Ur ttraǧu ara imrayen ad fakken!** Awi-d kan inig s wudem azigzag deg wumuɣ. D wa i d abrid arurad akk ad tferneḍ iferdisen!
introduction-dialog.slide12-text: Kando d win i d-yufraren s waggan s wudem afellay. Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ayagi akken ad teldiḍ isnasen, ifuyla, ad ttuselkmen imakṛuyen n unasiw, akked aṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen. Tzemreḍ ad [tesnifleḍ aɣanib n umuɣ]({{link1}}), [rnu tignit n yisental]({{link2}}) akk daɣen [aseqdec n imesli]({{link3}}) deg wumuɣen-ik·im!
introduction-dialog.slide13-text: Ma yella tesriḍ tallalt deg kra n tneqqiḍt, tzemreḍ ad tedduḍ ɣur-neɣ deg [Discord Server]({{link1}}) neɣ selken [tasemlit]({{link2}})!
introduction-dialog.title: Ansuf ɣer Kando!
introduction-dialog.slide1-title: Kando yettak-d abrid asuf s tmellit i teywalt akked uselkim-ik·im.
introduction-dialog.slide1-text: Sedrurem gar tigriwin-agi iwakken ad tlemdeḍ acu kando yezmer ad k·em-yexdem! Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ ticraḍ n yixef deg uzelmaḍ iwakken ad tneggezeḍ s tɣawla ɣer wuḥric tebɣiḍ deg tazwart.
introduction-dialog.slide2-text-standard: Ma tesnekreḍ Kando i tikkelt tamezwarut, tzemreḍ ad teldiḍ umuɣ umedya s Ctrl+Space. Mdel-it tikkelt niḍen s tqeffalt Escape neɣ s tqeffalt tayeffust n tɣerdayt deg wanda i tebɣiḍ deg ugdil.
introduction-dialog.slide2-text-no-shortcuts: Ma tesnekreḍ Kando i tikkelt tamezwarut, tzemreḍ [ad tgeḍ kra n yisurifen imernanen i Linux akken ad ddunt inegzumen unasiw amatu] ({{link}}). Ma ifat yetteddu waya, tzemreḍ ad tmedleḍ umuɣ s tsarut Escape neɣ s teqfalt tayefust n tɣerdayt.
introduction-dialog.slide11-text: **Ur ttaggad ara seg tefrayt n usehwu** Tigawin ttuselkment akken kan ara tserḥeḍ i tqeffalt n tɣerdayt-ik·im deg uskar n ucraḍ neɣ s tsarut n unasiw deg uskar Turbu. Seqdec wagi iwakken ad tesnirmeḍ umuɣ!

menu-themes-dialog.light-dark-mode-info: Ma yermed, tzemreḍ ad tferneḍ asentel-nniḍen akked yiniten yemgaraden almend n unagraw-ik·im ma yella uskar d aceɛlal neɣ aɣmayan.
menu-themes-dialog.author: sɣur {{author}}
menu-themes-dialog.accent-colors-info: Yal asentel yezmer ad isɛu tagrumma-nniḍen n yiniten s uɣdebbu.
menu-themes-dialog.no-accent-colors: Asentel-agi ur isefrak ara initen n uɣdebbu.
menu-themes-dialog.title: Isental n wumuɣ
menu-themes-dialog.fade-in-time-info: Akud yettaṭṭaf i wumuɣ akken ad d-iban cwiṭ, cwiṭ. Amezwer d 150mili-tasint.
menu-themes-dialog.fade-out-time-info: Akud yettaṭṭaf i wumuɣ akken ad ixsi. Amezwer d 200mili-tasint.
menu-themes-dialog.menu-scale-info: Seqdec wagi iwakken ad tsimɣureḍ neɣ ad tessidreḍ tiddi n wumuɣen-ik·im. Amezwer d 1.0.
menu-themes-dialog.selection-wedges-info: Ma yella yermed yerna itteddu deg usentel yettwafernen, teɣzut n wefran n iferdisen ad ttwasebrureq.

settings.add-collection-tooltip: Snulfu-d tagrumma n wumuɣ tamaynut. Seqdec tigrummiwin i wesdukkel n wumuɣen s ticraḍ!
settings.no-menus-note: Ma tekkseḍ taneggarut s usehwu, tzemreḍ ad t-id-terreḍ s tqeffalt n usefsex.
settings.empty-collection-note: Ẓreg ticṛaḍ yellan ddaw-a neɣ rnu umuɣ amaynut ɣer tagrumma-agi s tqeffalt ddaw-a.
settings.add-menu-item-hint: Zuɣer aferdis-agi akken ad t-ternuḍ ɣer wumuɣ uksawen!

app-picker.hint: Tzemreḍ daɣen ad d-zuɣreḍ u ad tserseḍ asnas seg usenker n wumuɣ-ik·im ɣer umaẓrag n wumuɣ n Kando!

settings.menu-behavior-info: Send ad tremdeḍ tinefrunin-a, ad k-nwelleh ad nelmed amek i nḥemmel tiddin tamezwert n Kando [here]({{link}})!
settings.centered-mode-info: Ldi umuɣ deg tlemmast n ugdil wala ɣer uswir n teḥnaccaḍt.
settings.anchored-mode-info: Ldi umuɣ anaddaw deg yiwen n yideg am wumuɣ amarraw. Aṛṛcem n waya, ad isexsi Askar n ucraḍ d uskar Turbu.
settings.hover-mode-info: I yiseqdacen inaẓiyen kan! Fren iferdisen s uɛeddi sufella-nsen.
settings.menu-conditions-info: Tzemreḍ ad tesdukleḍ deqs n wumuɣen deg yiwen unegzum syin fren s daww anta tiwtilin i ilaqen i yal umuɣ akken ad yettwasken.
settings.app-condition-info: Sken kan umuɣ-agi ma yella asaḍes ɣef usnas uzzig. Aya yessefrak tanfalit talugant am /firefox|chrome/i.
settings.app-condition: Ad yeddu kan i Kra n Isnasen
settings.tags-info: Ticraḍ zemrent ad ttwasqedcent i wegraw n wumuɣen deg wumuɣ n tigrummiwin.

screen-area-picker.top-left: Zuɣer wagi ɣer tama ufella tazelmaḍt n teɣzut-ik·im.
screen-area-picker.bottom-right: Zuɣer wagi ɣer n wadda tayeffust n teɣzut-ik·im.
screen-area-picker.invalid: Ẓer ma tiɣmert ufella tazelmaḍt tella sufella u ɣer tama tazelmaḍt n tiɣmert tayeffust taddayt.

window-picker-dialog.instructions: Ttekki ɣef tqeffalt ddaw-a, sakin err asaḍas ɣer usfaylu anican deg semmus n tsinin i d-itteddun.

settings.restore-general-settings-warning-message: Ayagi ad isemselsi iɣewwaṛen n usnas amiran akked igburen n ufaylu n uḥraz yettwafernen! Umuɣen-ik·im akked tigrummiwin n wumuɣ ur ttwaḥaz ara.

command.name: Selkem Taladna
command.detached: Selkem s wudem n war amsedday
command.tip-1: Tzemreḍ ad tesqedceḍ anaw n uferdis n tladna i usenker n yisnasen neɣ iskripten.

added-items.description: Snulfu-d {{n}} n yiferdisen deg umaẓrag n wumuɣ.

full-menu.name: Teɣzi ɣef telqayt
full-menu.description: Snulfu-d umuɣ s wugar n mraw d sin n yiferdisen.

deep-menu.name: Akerwa n telqayt
deep-menu.description: Rnu aferdis n wumuɣ ɣer wumuɣ anaddaw yesɛan kuẓ n yiswiren.

menu-themes-selected.description: Senfel asentel n wumuɣ {{n}} n tikkal.

many-selections-streak.name: Ifassen n lebraq {{tier}}
many-selections-streak.description: Fren {{n}} n yiferdisen deg {{time}} n tasinin.

speedy-selections-streak.name: D arurad ugar ɣef uxemmem {{tier}}
speedy-selections-streak.description: Egg {{n}} n ifran uḍfiren deg tlemmast s tɣawla ugar n {{time}} n tasinin.

main.inhibit-shortcuts: Sens s wudem askudan akk inegzumen
main.invalid-link-message: Ur izmer ara aslaḍ n useɣwen lqayen.
